definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
sorbitol C6H14O6 (sugar substitute and mild laxative)

sentences.english: Using sorbitol as a substitute for polyglycerin to make an industrial deformer was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 试验了用山梨醇取代聚甘油制工业用消泡剂的可能性。

sentences.english: Sorbitol acetals is the most one kind of the nucleating agents for polypropylene crystallization.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇缩醛是最重要的聚丙烯成核剂之一。

sentences.english: Transporters is a key enzyme for the transportation of sorbitol in Rosaceae plants.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇转运子是蔷薇科植物运输山梨醇的重要酶。

sentences.english: Transporters is a key enzyme for the transportation of sorbitol in Rosaceae plants.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇转运子是蔷薇科植物运输山梨醇的重要酶。

sentences.english: Sorbitol has one very odd property.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇有一非常奇怪的性质。

sentences.english: First, the synthesis method and anti-microbial activity of bromo-sorbic acid were studied.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分为溴代山梨酸的合成方法和抗菌作用研究。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for preparing isosorbide modified polyester.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种异山梨醇改性聚酯的制备方法。

sentences.english: Sorbic acid is a new type of antiseptic and freshening agent for food.
sentences.chinese: 山梨酸是一种新型的食品防腐保鲜剂。

sentences.english: In 1959, two typhoons destroyed much of Yamanashi Prefecture’s livestock.
sentences.chinese: 1959年，两场台风摧毁了山梨县大部分牲畜。

sentences.english: L-sorbose has inhibitory effect to the reaction.
sentences.chinese: 山梨糖对该反应有抑制作用。

sentences.english: Sorbitol took an effect on controlling weight loss of strawberry at normal temperature.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇能起到良好的控制草莓在常温下的失重问题。

sentences.english: These opportunities have helped us build mutual trust and respect with the city of Yamanashi.
sentences.chinese: 这些机会帮助我们建立了与山梨市的相互信任和尊重。

sentences.english: This paper introduces three enzymes related to sorbitol metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了参与山梨醇代谢的三种酶。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare osmotic pump controlled release tablets of isosorbide mononitrate.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备单硝酸异山梨酯渗透泵控释片。

sentences.english: The stability of a new pharmaceutical preparation, isosorbide dinitrate pills, was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对新研制的硝酸异山梨酯滴丸进行稳定性实验研究。

sentences.english: Among them, Yamanashi Prefecture is the first time measured.
sentences.chinese: 其中，山梨县是首次被测出。
